sentences.english: On the inside is a traditional Chinese painting of flowers and birds.
sentences.chinese: 里边画的是一幅中国传统花鸟画。

sentences.english: He resumed painting secretly, and went sketching in Zhongshan Park, painting flower-and-bird volumes.
sentences.chinese: 开始悄悄作画，去中山公园写生，作花鸟册页等。

sentences.english: The fifth part is the paintings of flowers, birds, grass, insects.
Such are the Feelings of a person who has just watched Mr.
sentences.chinese: 杨玉琪先生的花鸟画所给人的感觉正是如此。

sentences.english: Its influence on the Flower-bird paining in Chongqing has been lasted until present.
sentences.chinese: 重庆的花鸟画也受其影响持续至今。

sentences.english: The good works of flowers and birds painted flowers and birds in the natural environment, wild look.
sentences.chinese: 其花鸟作品长于在天然情况中描绘花鸟的神情野趣。

sentences.english: The good works of flowers and birds painted flowers and birds in the natural environment, wild look.
sentences.chinese: 其花鸟作品长于在天然情况中描绘花鸟的神情野趣。

sentences.english: Mr. Su Baozhen is a famous artist painting flowers-and-birds in our country.
sentences.chinese: 苏葆桢先生是我国著名的花鸟画家。

sentences.english: Flower-and-bird painting, landscape painting, figure painting were in a tripartite balance in the Tang period.
sentences.chinese: 唐代的花鸟画与山水画同人物画鼎足而立。

sentences.english: The background is pale blue with traditional Chinese paintings of flowers and birds.
sentences.chinese: 底色是浅蓝的，另有中国花鸟画。

sentences.english: Probably an immature male Scarlet-backed Flowerpecker.
sentences.chinese: 可能是未成年的雄性朱背啄花鸟吧。

sentences.english: The flower-and-bird painting was executed with great delicacy.
sentences.chinese: 那幅花鸟画画得很工致。

sentences.english: The background is pale blue with Chinese paintings of flowers and birds.
sentences.chinese: 淡蓝色底纹的中国传统花鸟画。

sentences.english: " Chen Yongkang flower and bird paintings has published many books".
sentences.chinese: 出版有《陈永康花鸟画集》多册。

sentences.english: Contemporary China flowers and birds painting is that one be diverse to with each other repair of organic dynamic state structure system.
sentences.chinese: 当代中国花鸟画是一个多元互补的有机动态结构系统。
